mapper.insert: insert into a_report_downstream (downstreamReportId, appId, slotId, createTime, hour, downstreamRequest, t200, t250, t300, t400, t500, t1000) values (#{downstreamReportId},#{appId},#{slotId},now(),#{hour},#{downstreamRequest},#{t200},#{t250},#{t300},#{t400},#{t500},#{t1000})

,t200 = t200 + 1
,t250 = t250 + 1
,t300 = t300 + 1
,t400 = t400 + 1
,t500 = t500 + 1
,t1000 = t1000 + 1
where downstreamReportId = #{downstreamReportId}

mapper.insert: insert into a_report_upstream (id, downstreamReportId, upstreamId, appId, slotId, upstreamType, createTime, hour, request, response, look, click, deeplink) values (#{id},#{downstreamReportId},#{upstreamId},#{appId},#{slotId},#{upstreamType},now(),#{hour},1,#{response},0,0,0)

update a_report_upstream set

look = look + 1
click = click + 1
